patthana14.14:1.1: Sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:2.1_0: Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.14:2.1_1: paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo
patthana14.14:2.1_2: ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:3.1: Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.14:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
